author: Axios
title: FCC chair: Internet access is "the glue" holding Americans' lives together during pandemic
description: FCC Chair Ajit Pai said Thursday during an Axios virtual event that internet connectivity is "the glue" for many Americans' daily lives during the coronavirus pandemic.Why it matters: Pai specifically cited both education and telehealth as reasons why interne…
